name: HSP_ACCT_CPT_ASSOC_DX
description: This table stores the diagnoses that are linked to a coded Current Procedural Terminology (CPT)/Healthcare Common Procedure Coding System (HCPCS) code on a hospital account.

columns.name: ACCT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the hospital account record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number of the CPT�/HCPCS code stored on the hospital account to which the diagnoses are linked.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of an associated diagnosis linked to a specific CPT�/HCPCS code on a hospital account.

columns.name: CPT_LINKED_DX_ID
columns.description: This item stores the diagnoses linked to a coded CPT�/HCPCS on an account.
